# Belhard Projects

## BlackJack
Simple **black jack** game in terminal.

[![asciicast](https://asciinema.org/a/u5pClKzpWHrvZFRQqVqYnwfMc.svg)](https://asciinema.org/a/u5pClKzpWHrvZFRQqVqYnwfMc)

Install:
```shell
pip3 install ah-blackjack
```
Execute:
```shell
bj
```
